title: Stars roll to fifth straight win, beating Penguins 4-1
text: BING NEWS: Stars roll to fifth straight win, beating Penguins 4-1 PITTSBURGH (AP) â€” Jason Spezza scored his fifth goal of the season and the Dallas Stars beat the Pittsburgh Penguins 4-1 on Thursday night for their fifth straight victory.
